16307
Test: public void testAutomaticUsage() throws Exception { HelpFormatter hf = new HelpFormatter(); Options options = null; String expected = "usage: app [-a]"; ByteArrayOutputStream out = new ByteArrayOutputStream(); PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(out); options = new Options().addOption("a", false, "aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa"); hf.printUsage(pw, 60, "app", options); pw.flush(); out.reset(); expected = "usage: app [-a] [-b]"; options = new Options().addOption("a", false, "aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa") .addOption("b", false, "bbb"); hf.printUsage(pw, 60, "app", options); pw.flush(); out.reset(); }
Code: private static void reset(){description = null;argName = "arg";longopt = null;;required = false;numberOfArgs = Option.UNINITIALIZED;;valuesep = (char) -1;}
